channel.title: How to lose 30m
channel.description:
Basically, every time I get money I dice it because I really don't care about RS anymore.
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bqRpQClSpKk[/youtube] Skip to around 1:50 if you don't feel like seeing me talk to a random guy. Didn't feel like editing the video after recording it.
Sorry for the voice of someone talking about midway through the video, was watching a Skyrim playthrough ;)

item.title: How to lose 30m
item.dc:creator: @devenb123 devenb123
item.description:
@devenb123 wrote:

if your gonna waste 30m give it to me lol

Read full topic

item.title: How to lose 30m
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:8, topic:420823”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=523497.msg3807732#msg3807732 date=1320616619]

You could sell the gold for $20 or $30 instead of just giving it away.
Or you could give it to me, 60m away from something

inb4anothersanta

It would be my 4th one. Lost the other 3 from 3 other ways… Or I could just say I gave them away without looking like an idiot :3
[/quote]

Holy shit you’re horrible with money…[/quote]

The first one was 84M, the second one was 124M and the 3rd was 131M. I still have a 120M bank even though I lost all this shit. There’s only 3 ways of losing items and I’ve learned them, 1 was luring and the other two were trade scamming. The only good side is I know how to repeat the luring method which can make me billions, as soon as I get another hat… :). I’m only using them to merch, because these are the only items that will not go down, and if they do go down, they’ll go back up sooner or later because no more can be put into the game. For example, dragonfire shields, they can go up to 15M then they’ll drop to 10M and eventually to 5M because there’s an infinite amount of dragonfire shields put into the game, not an infinite amount of santa hats/rares put into the game. I can’t wear rare items because people always try to get the shit from me, I’m great with money though. It stays in my bank and nobody sees it

Read full topic

item.title: How to lose 30m
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

I guess I’ll try

THAT MOENY SHALL BE MYNE111111

Watch as they say to everyone “Sowwy u wer da fowtyfowst customow”

EDIT:

Dam, they are doing this everyday, I’m like “Then how’d he get that money? :o”

IMA GETY IT

Wow srsly i didnt get it lol
